properties.ADU Min. Parking Spaces Units: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
properties.Tooltip Notes: Water/wastewater connections are required for subdivisions located within the public water service area, but this ruling is not specified for structures in general. If a lot is located within the public water service area it is probable that a connection to water and/or wastewater is required. Conditional use review required for multi-family developments with 16+ units. "Accessory dwellings [...] are allowed only as an accessory use to a pre-existing dwelling" (Page 2-23). As such, ADUs are marked as prohibited for new developments.

properties.Tooltip Notes: "Accessory dwellings [...] are allowed only as an accessory use to a pre-existing dwelling" (Page 2-25). Preexisting meaning before the date of the last version of that section (2105.B(29)), which is March 5th, 2019.

properties.Special Notes:
DWELLING, MULTI-FAMILY. A structure or part of a structure containing three or more
dwelling units each intended for habitation by one household and providing complete
independent living facilities including permanent provisions for living, sleeping, eating,
cooking and sanitation.

Major Projects. The Development Review Board will review site plan applications for major
projects as follows:
(1) The Development Review Board must hold a public hearing and issue a decision on a
site plan application in accordance with Section 4601 and Section 4605.
